Pray for More.name: Pray for More
Pray for More.flavor: You strike your enemy, but you pray to increase the amount of damage you deal.
Pray for More.effect: If you don’t like the damage you have rolled with one of your attacks, reroll your damage. You must use the result of the second roll.

Carving a Path of Light.name: Carving a Path of Light
Carving a Path of Light.flavor: Your weapon glows with astral light, and as it strikes your enemy, that glow spreads to encompass all enemies adjacent to you, temporarily coating them with a glowing target your allies can see.
Carving a Path of Light.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and until the end of your next turn, your allies have combat advantage against any enemy adjacent to you.

Astral Whirlwind.name: Astral Whirlwind
Astral Whirlwind.flavor: Your faith directs you into a whirling attack that strikes out at every foe within reach, instilling them with fear and weakening their defenses.
Astral Whirlwind.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Astral Whirlwind.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. In addition, the target takes a –2 penalty to all defenses (save ends).
Astral Whirlwind.special: If this attack kills one or more evil or chaotic evil creatures, roll a d20. On a roll of 10 or higher, you can use this power again during this encounter.
